## Reporter.begin() method

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Called before formatting begins (for reporters that need setup).

**Signature:**

```typescript
begin?(): ReportOutput | void;
```
**Returns:**

[ReportOutput](./change-detector-core.reportoutput.md) \| void

## Remarks

Optional lifecycle hook. Useful for HTML reporters that need to emit document headers, or JSON reporters starting an array.
